mapper.select: select ir.*, pc.passcheck from ir_info ir left join assigned_info ass on ir.member_info_no = ass.member_info_no left join pass_comment pc on ass.assigned_interviewer = pc.imember_info_no and ass.member_info_no = pc.member_info_no where ass.assigned_interviewer = #{assigned_interviewer}
select count(*) from ir_info ir left join assigned_info ass on ir.member_info_no = ass.member_info_no where ass.assigned_interviewer = #{assigned_interviewer}

select ir.member_info_no, ir.co_code, ir.interviewer_no, ir.name, ir.email, ir.phone, ir.category, ir.zoom_no, ir.ir_path_code, ir.interviewer_info_no, rpad(substr(ssn, 1, 8), length(ssn), '*') as ssn, decode(substr(ssn, 8, 1), '1', '남', '3', '남', '여') as gender, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - (DECODE(SUBSTR(ssn,8,1),'1', '19','2','19','20') || SUBSTR(ssn,1,2)) +1 as age, nvl(ii.self_introduction, '없음') as self_introduction, ii.image, it.job_posting_name from ir_info ir left join interviewer_info ii on ir.member_info_no = ii.interviewer_info_no left join interview_time it on ir.member_info_no = it.member_info_no where ir.member_info_no = #{interviewer_info_no}
select interview_no, co_code, title, content, imember_info_no from interview where imember_info_no = #{imember_info_no}
mapper.update: update interview_evaluate set evaluate_value = #{evaluate_value}, evaluate_comment = #{evaluate_comment} where interview_no = #{interview_no}
mapper.select: select member_info_no, start_time, end_time, job_posting_name from interview_time where member_info_no = #{member_info_no} and co_code = #{co_code}
select * from assigned_info where member_info_no = #{member_info_no} and assigned_interviewer not in (#{assigned_interviewer})

select i.title, ie.interview_no, ie.member_info_no, ie.evaluate_value, ie.evaluate_comment from interview i left join interview_evaluate ie on i.interview_no = ie.interview_no where ie.member_info_no = #{member_no}
select a.member_info_no, i.name from assigned_info a left join ir_info i on a.member_info_no = i.member_info_no where i.co_code = #{co_code} group by a.member_info_no,i.name
select count(*) from( select a.member_info_no, i.name from assigned_info a left join ir_info i on a.member_info_no = i.member_info_no where i.co_code = #{co_code} group by a.member_info_no,i.name)

SELECT a.*, i.co_code, nvl(p.passcheck, '미평가') as passcheck, py.FINAL_PASS_CHECK FROM assigned_Info a left join ir_info i on a.member_info_no = i.member_info_no left join pass_comment p on a.member_info_no = p.member_info_no and a.assigned_interviewer = p.imember_info_no left join pass_yn py on py.member_info_no = p.member_info_no where a.member_info_no = #{member_info_no} and i.co_code = #{co_code}
mapper.insert: insert into pass_yn values ( seq_pass_no.nextval, #{member_info_no}, #{co_code}, #{final_pass_check}, sysdate, #{board_write_yn} )
mapper.select: select evaluate_no from interview_evaluate where interview_no = #{interview_no} and member_info_no = #{member_info_no}
